entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Document an exhaustive list of packages shipped in or used by a given version of the .NET SDK #43800
  • Document recommended behaviors/configurations for users that use Package Lock Files with the .NET SDK #43799
  • In Debian ARM64, `dotnet test` does not work #43790

Closed

  • Flexibility of installation on Linux is more trouble than it is worth. #36046
  • How to make `dotnet run` invoke an MSBuild target? #31253
    9.0.1xx
  • Getting System.NullReferenceException when running `dotnet tool update -g --all` #42598
  • Transitive project references missing aliases #2454
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable baseline manifest generation #43797
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Fix roslyn issues with non-official version builds #43796
    untriaged
  • Allow for older Windows SDK projection packages without profiles to build on .NET 9 #43795
    untriaged, Area-WindowsSDK
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers prerequisites #43794
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Always disable NuGet auditing in source-only build #43696
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve logging from agent #43672
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #43791
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43157
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix typos #43730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix port when fall back to http #43620
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2549754 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix baseline manifest version for RTM branding #43737
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    Area-Containers
  • Add Lock comments for Windows setup #43699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
